channel.title: Far Cry 3
channel.description:
[u]Release Dates[/u] EU November 29, 2012 AU November 29, 2012 UK November 30, 2012 NA December 4, 2012
![](upload://1IxC9djg1ce52sl8MpytwUNJ3z0.jpeg) [img]https://i.haymarket.net.au/News/Far-Cry-3-Screenshot-9.jpg[/img] [img]https://media1.gameinformer.com/imagefeed/screenshots/FarCry3/FC3_SCR_A12_03.jpg[/img] [img]https://www.gamerzines.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/11/Cenote_kick_NO_LOGO_GOLD.jpg[/img]
Anyone else getting this game? I am a maybe so far

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.dc:creator: MSKyuuni
item.description:
Maxey:

At some point you have to realize that maybe, just maybe, it’s no use to keep trying to play modern graphical intensive games on such an outdated computer.

I realised that long ago, I just don’t have the money.

EDIT: Specs, if anyone still cares
Windows 7 32-bit
GeForce 9100M G
Pentium Dual Core
4GB RAM

Read full topic

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
MSKyuuni:

^Funny enough, running in window mode actually makes it a frame or two faster. I don’t have it on Steam, only uPlay. It’s at the lowest resolution, which is still almost double what I play most games at. It’s on DX9. I’ll have an attempt at all the other things. Thanks, probably. My god, that’s a lot of sentences.

At some point you have to realize that maybe, just maybe, it’s no use to keep trying to play modern graphical intensive games on such an outdated computer.

Read full topic

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.dc:creator: Solokiller
item.description:
I tried running it on my old laptop, it nearly fried the video card. It was doing better than 4 frames a second.

Read full topic

It’s at the lowest resolution, which is still almost double what I play most games at. It’s on DX9. I’ll have an attempt at all the other things. Thanks, probably. My god, that’s a lot of sentences.

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
Lower your resolution. Kill explorer.exe when you launch the game. Put it in fullscreen if it isn’t already so you don’t render the desktop. Try increasing your virtual memory. Kill all unnecessary tasks. Get a non-steam crack for it so you don’t have to run steam. Make sure its running in DX9. Update your drivers.

Read full topic

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.dc:creator: MSKyuuni
item.description:
xalener:

What, Like Quake?

Nah, I’ve found quite a few recent games that run better, but yeah, my PC is generally terrible. That was kind of unexpected though honestly because I have been able to play Borderlands 2 and Just Cause 2 at an average of 50-60 FPS.

@Kairouseki I’ll check in a minute or two, I’m on my iPad and I don’t generally memorise these things :retard:

Read full topic

is it worth it or should I just trade it in for something less demanding?

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
What are your specs? Four fps is crazy low.

Read full topic

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
MSKyuuni:

Thread is deceased, I know, but has anyone got tips on making it run better? I’ve got a shitty computer and according to Razer Game Booster I’m getting a majestically steady four frames a second. I’ve tried forcing PostFX and SSAO to “false” and “0” respectively, but that won’t work for some reason. At 4 FPS, is it worth it or should I just trade it in for something less demanding?

Jokes aside, though, 4 FPS is completely unplayable. At that rate, there’s really nothing you can do to improve it short of a completely new rig.

Read full topic

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.dc:creator: Mented
item.description:
stoneage:

Gonna be picking this up on steam tomorrow. Just wondering for those that know, is the deluxe version worth it? It says it comes with a couple of extra missions but I’m not sure if they’re worth the extra $10 or not

I can say for certain that the ‘lost expedition’ missions are an absolute waste of time and money.

Read full topic

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.dc:creator: Aiden_Pearce
item.description:
So after playing the second throwing knives mini-game I can’t throw rocks and use camera anymore and it seems to be a common bug https://forums.ubi.com/showthread.php/731853-Far-Cry-3-isn-t-allowing-me-to-equip-my-Rock-Camera-or-let-me-inject, hopefully they’ll fix it soon.

Read full topic

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
Well, the first problem can be solved with a mute button, and the second with a good book.

Read full topic

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.dc:creator: ac3d
item.description:
I’ve got a dilemma, I want to replay the game and enjoy it’s open-world’edness, but I don’t want to listen to Jason’s whining and bitching, or sit through the lengthy unskippable cut scenes

Read full topic

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
It’s too bad they won’t patch in more healing animations. I don’t remember much from FC2 (don’t even remember why I hated it) but I certainly remember there were a ton more cool (and more gruesome) healing animations. I hate how I jump off a ledge, get bit by a shark, get bashed by a pirate, kicked by a cassowary, bitten by a komodo dragon, and nearly eaten by a tiger and 90% of the time it all gets healed by resetting my right thumb back into place. which may or may not have been dislocated in the first place.

Read full topic

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
But it is Christmas.

Read full topic

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.dc:creator: brokenfridgehinge
item.description:
So glad Ubi listened and are working on a patch that lets you remove all HUD elements. Now I can be fully immersed without having a box pop up every 5 seconds telling me what to do, and having flashing dead bodies light up the beach like it’s Christmas.

Read full topic

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.dc:creator: Aiden_Pearce
item.description:
Yeah…I think that,that,WW III arsenal that you gain within the first couple of hours takes care of that.

Read full topic

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
It’s actually a good idea, IMO. Keeps players from just being able to completely ignore the main questline until they’re an overpowered, max-level god.

Read full topic

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.dc:creator: Aiden_Pearce
item.description:
Maxey:

Well, it’s clear what you need to do then, isn’t it?

So it isn’t even mildly strange to you that an open world game is forcing you to play through story missions so you can invest skill points you earned?I have played many open world games and non of which had this abysmal constraint.

Read full topic
